alert.note: Alert for Ozaukee; Sheboygan; Washington (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 12 at 12:06PM CDT until October 12 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM CDT FOR OZAUKEE...SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON AND SOUTHEASTERN SHEBOYGAN COUNTIES... At 1205 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles east of Cleveland to Menomonee Falls, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sheboygan, Mequon, Brown Deer, Grafton, Cedarburg, Port Washington, Saukville, Bayside, Thiensville, Germantown, Oostburg, Belgium, Fredonia, Cedar Grove, Richfield, Colgate, Kirchhayn, Gibbsville and Hubertus. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
